programme.desc: Gwyneth Paltrow and Joseph Fiennes star in the Oscar-winning romcom about the Bard and the woman with whom he falls in love. With Judi Dench. Contains sexual scenes. (1998)(118 mins).

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: The late Sean Connery gives an Oscar-winning performance alongside Kevin Costner's Treasury agent, determined to take down Robert De Niro's Al Capone. (1987)(115 mins).

programme.title: The Last Of The Mohicans
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Daniel Day-Lewis stars as a Native American-raised settler caught up in the French and Indian war. Violence/flashing images. (1992)(117 mins).

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based adventure following a group of convicts as they attempt to break out of the world's most notorious prison. Starring Clint Eastwood. Violence/flashing images. (1979)(107 mins).

programme.title: King Creole
programme.desc: New Orleans musical starring Elvis Presley as a magnetic night club singer who falls in with club owner gangster Walter Matthau. Michael Curtiz directs. (1958)(110 mins).

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: Besieged colonel John Wayne battles Apache raiders, but his hardest fight is with his own son. Strong western; a fitting finale to John Ford's legendary Cavalry trilogy. (1950)(101 mins).

programme.title: Cries And Whispers
programme.desc: When Maria and Karin visit their terminally ill sister Agnes to take care of her, feelings of resentment start to resurface. (1972)(95 mins).

programme.title: Fanny And Alexander
programme.desc: Two young Swedish children in the 1900s experience the many comedies and tragedies of their lively and affectionate theatrical family, the Ekdahls. (1982)(188 mins).

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Terrific adventure about the making of the great detective. At school, the young Holmes traces three poison dart murders to an Egyptian cult. (1985)(104 mins).

programme.desc: Goldie Hawn busts her husband out of jail, kidnaps a cop and goes on the run in Texas. Crime drama from Steven Spielberg. Violence/flashing images/stereo sound only. (1974)(106 mins).

programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. programme.title: The Machine
programme.desc: Bert, a stand-up comedian known as 'The Machine', is targeted by the Russian mob when his hard-partying past catches up with him 20 years down the road. Bert and his father are kidnapped to atone for those he wronged, and together they must re-trace the steps of his younger self while attempting to find common ground in their often fraught relationship. programme.title: Polite Society
programme.desc: The bond between siblings Ria and Lena is tested when doctor Salim woos Lena and sweeps her off her feet to the visible delight of his controlling mother. A jealous and embittered Ria becomes suspicious of Salim and she vows to expose his true intentions. programme.title: A Tiger's Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creature's mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tiger's Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. programme.title: The Machine
programme.desc: Bert, a stand-up comedian known as 'The Machine', is targeted by the Russian mob when his hard-partying past catches up with him 20 years down the road. Bert and his father are kidnapped to atone for those he wronged, and together they must re-trace the steps of his younger self while attempting to find common ground in their often fraught relationship. programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Fantasy, Drama, Children's ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Peter and his younger sister Verity move into a new house and struggle to acclimatise to their surroundings in an emotionally unsettling period for their family. programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring William Shatner and DeForest Kelley. Barely surviving the wrath of Khan, the battle-scarred starship Enterprise limps back to Earth, saved only by the sacrifice of the late Captain Spock. However, the Vulcan's spirit is still with the crew, and back on the artificial Eden of the new Genesis planet his corpse is missing. programme.title: It Came from Outer Space

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.sub-title: Thriller, Drama, Action, Comedy, Crime/detective, Mystery ║ 2001 ║ 12
programme.desc: Martial arts thriller, starring Jackie Chan as a salesman at a exercise equipment store, who has dreams of living a more adventurous life. His wish starts to come true when he follows two suspicious-looking men into an alley and jumps into action when he realises they are robbing a jewellery shop. The resulting publicity from his heroic act brings him to the attention of a private investigator, who convinces him that he is the long-lost son of a rich Korean businessman. programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: In a year of F1 that sees more races than ever before, the ride begins with the 2023 Bahrain Grand Prix. Max Verstappen is joined by Sergio Perez in a Red Bull front-row lockout. (05.03).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: On the front row, pole-sitter Sergio Perez is joined by Fernando Alonso as George Russell completes the top three for the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix. Max Verstappen starts from P15. (19.03).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: On Sunday at Albert Park, Max Verstappen has pole with George Russell joining the world champion on the front row for the 2023 Australian Grand Prix. Lewis Hamilton starts in third. (02.04).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The Azerbaijan Grand Prix sees the first of six F1 Sprints. With Ferrari's Charles Leclerc on pole in a 100km dash, the drivers race all the way to the chequered flag. (29.04).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Azerbaijan Grand Prix has arrived as Baku prepares for 51 laps of high-octane racing. Charles Leclerc's immense one-lap pace in Friday's qualifying secured Ferrari pole. (30.04).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The wait is over - it's Formula 1 race day at the Miami International Autodrome in Florida. Sergio Perez starts on pole with Fernando Alonso also on the front row. (07.05).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: On the streets of Monte Carlo, the one-of-a-kind Monaco Grand Prix arrives, as Max Verstappen has pole ahead of Fernando Alonso. Esteban Ocon starts in P3 with Lewis Hamilton in P5. (28.05).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Max Verstappen has pole at the 2023 Spanish Grand Prix, while home favourite Carlos Sainz joins the Dutchman at the front. Lando Norris and Lewis Hamilton make up the second row. (04.06).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: At the 2023 Canadian Grand Prix, Max Verstappen mastered the wet to secure pole position with Fernando Alonso and Lewis Hamilton both on the hunt in second and third respectively. (18.06).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Austrian Grand Prix sees the second of six F1 Sprints this season. In a 100km dash, the drivers race all the way to the chequered flag for a haul of championship points. (01.07).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The Red Bull Ring in Spielberg is the venue for the 2023 Austrian Grand Prix. Last season, Charles Leclerc denied Max Verstappen to take P1 in Red Bull's backyard. (02.07).

programme.title: British F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out at Silverstone as the 2023 British Grand Prix gets underway. Another superb Spielberg performance sees the Dutchman Max Verstappen carry all the momentum here. (09.07).

programme.desc: Highlights of the 2023 Saudi Arabian Grand Prix at the Jeddah Corniche Circuit.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights of the 2023 Australian Grand Prix in Melbourne. Last season, Charles Leclerc started in pole and finished the race in P1 for Ferrari.

programme.title: F1 Highlights

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: The Red Bull Ring in Spielberg is the venue for the 2023 Austrian Grand Prix. Last season, Charles Leclerc denied Max Verstappen to take P1 in Red Bull's backyard.
